name: ISIPL HD Ticket Customization
HD Ticket Comment
script:
# Only run for HD Ticket comments if doc.reference_doctype == "HD Ticket" and doc.comment_type == "Comment": # ------------------------------------ # 1. Build your updated final HTML again # ------------------------------------ html_rows = [] ticket = frappe.get_doc("HD Ticket", doc.reference_name) for row in ticket.custom_test_hd: html_rows.append( f'''
  • {row.name1}
    • ''' ) final_html = f'''
      {''.join(html_rows)}
    ''' # ------------------------------------ # 2. Update Comment content # ------------------------------------ frappe.db.set_value("Comment", doc.name, "content", final_html) # ------------------------------------ # 3. Create HD Ticket Comment # ------------------------------------ hd_comment = frappe.get_doc({ "doctype": "HD Ticket Comment", "reference_ticket": doc.reference_name, "comment_id": doc.name, "commented_by": doc.comment_email or doc.owner, "content": final_html }).insert(ignore_permissions=True) # ------------------------------------ # 4. Link HD Ticket Comment back to Comment # ------------------------------------ frappe.db.set_value( "Comment", doc.name, "custom_hd_comment_id", hd_comment.name )

name: Hd Customer Creation
script:
if not frappe.db.get_value("HD Customer", doc.customer_name):
    frappe.get_doc(dict(doctype = 'HD Customer',customer_name = doc.customer_name)).insert()

name: command update
script:
# Build HTML rows html_rows = [ f"""
  • {row.machine_name}
    • """ for row in doc.custom_machine_type_list ] # Heading + list final_html = f"""
    Machine Type

      {''.join(html_rows)}
    """ # Check if existing comment exists existing_comment = frappe.db.get_value( "Comment", { "reference_doctype": doc.doctype, "reference_name": doc.name, "comment_type": "Comment", }, "name" ) if existing_comment: comment_doc = frappe.get_doc("Comment", existing_comment) comment_doc.content = final_html comment_doc.save(ignore_permissions=True) else: frappe.get_doc({ "doctype": "Comment", "comment_type": "Comment", "reference_doctype": doc.doctype, "reference_name": doc.name, "content": final_html }).insert(ignore_permissions=True)
